layer.name: Order
layer.definition: Reality has patterns that can be discovered and used.

questions.text: I believe there is an objective moral order â€” right and wrong are real, not just personal preferences.
questions.principle: Moral reality exists independently of opinion

questions.text: I believe moral truth can be discovered through reason, revelation, and conscience.
I see evidence of moral order in the consistency of conscience across cultures and throughout history.
questions.principle: Universal moral patterns indicate moral reality

questions.text: I reject the idea that morality is purely constructed, arbitrary, or meaningless.
I believe living in alignment with moral order leads to flourishing, while violating it leads to destruction.
